sentence.Network_en: The immensity of the universe is difficult to grasp.
We have no intuitive grasp of the immensity of time.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们对时间的无限没有什么直观的认识.

综合英语单词表(第二册下) - 豆丁网 ... immensely ad. 极大地，无限地 immensity n. 无限，浩瀚 import v. 引进；进口.
immediately following 紧跟着immensity 广大；无限；无限的空间immerse 浸渍

list.abs: 请教关于足球的专业术语释义及其该名词的英文... ... wing： 边路、两翼 immense player： 伟大的球员 practice： 训练.

we also believe that what we have achieved is only part of the iceberg , and we still have immense potential to dig out below the sea and a lot to expand in the future .我们还相信，我们所取得的成绩只是冰山的一角，在海平面下我们仍然有巨大的潜力可以挖掘，在未来有更多的空间可以拓展。
we live in an age that is characterized , above , its immense accumulation of knowledge .我们所处年代的特征就是知识的大量积累。
... an immense amount of time 大量的时间 immense importance 非常重要 ad. to a very great extent;extremely 非常，很.

entry.def: If you describe something as immense, you mean that it is extremely large or great.

example.ex: With immense relief I stopped running.
example.tran: 我长长地松了一口气，停止了奔跑。

means.word_mean: 1. unusual largeness in size or extent
